title: A13_Q03_Conciseness

justifications.3: Candidate 3 is the most concise, distilling the feedback and actionable steps into the fewest words while retaining clarity.

title: A13_Q04_Accuracy

justifications.1: Candidate 1 accurately reflects the original text's points about Elliot's consistency, need for initiative, and the implication for advancement, while the suggestions are reasonable interpretations of 'seeking help to achieve better results' and 'initiative'.

justifications.1: This candidate maintains a professional and objective tone, similar to the original, while offering constructive feedback.
